item.title: Blog: New Theme New Backend; Who's this?
item.description: Enqack.net was running a forked and customized theme for Jekyll to produce a static site. I have moved over to Hugo with the Docsy theme. Hugo is a static site generator written in go. A blog post or documentation of the process will be posted soon.
